question.para: X11/Xlib.h: No such file or directory

answer.screen:
$ echo -en 'x11:
	gcc x11.c
' > Makefile $ echo -en '#include <X11/Xlib.h>
main() { }
' > x11.c $ make gcc x11.c x11.c:1: X11/Xlib.h: No such file or directory make: *** [x11] Error 1 $ rm Makefile x11.c $
answer.para: Creating a couple symlinks will fix it. Here are the commands:
answer.screen: cd /usr ln -s X11R6 X11 cd include ln -s ../X11/include/X11 X11
